metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3639 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A potential DOS vulnerability was discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 10.8 before 15.1.6, all versions starting from 15.2 before 15.2.4, all versions starting from 15.3 before 15.3.2. Improper data handling on branch creation could have been used to trigger high CPU usage.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
